creator: gadams@apache.org
text:
in [1], the area tree (AT) format is referred to as 'intermediate format'; this material needs to be updated to refer to the new IF format if the suggested workaround works with IF; if the suggested workaround does not work with IF, then the phrase 'intermediate format' should be changed to 'area tree'

[1] http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/trunk/output.html#general-fonts
